sentences.en: A new battleship was launched from a shipyard.
sentences.cn: 一艘新战舰从船坞下水。

sentences.en: No one knew what caused the explosion on the battleship Maine.
sentences.cn: 没有人知道是什么原因引起缅因号军舰发生爆炸。

sentences.en: The water was calm and blue, and surrounding Battleship Island were several fishing boats.
sentences.cn: 海面很平静，海水也很蓝。 军舰岛周边漂着几只渔船。
